channel.title: Latest News | The Mind in Action Lab

item.title: The lab has a website
item.description:
The inofficial start of the lab. We have a website and are looking forward to grow over the next couple of months. So, if you’re interested in studying the interplay between actions and memory, or the perception of causality, please consider joining the lab in Berlin.

I will be more than happy to discuss possibilities for you to join us.
